SpaceInvaders.Objects

Class Protection

  • java.lang.Object
    • SpaceInvaders.Objects.SpaceObject
      • SpaceInvaders.Objects.Bonus
        • SpaceInvaders.Objects.Protection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable, Movable

    public class Protection
extends Bonus
    Protection extends Bonus class. Represents protection bonus type.
    Author:
    Jose Miguel Melo & Ricardo Loureiro

      • Protection

        public Protection(Position position,
                  SpriteSheet sprite)
        Protection default constructor. Protection bonus duration set to its default value -> PROTECTION_DURATION.
        Parameters:
        position - Position on screen.
        sprite - Protection sprite representation.

                  SpriteSheet sprite,

        Protection constructor.
        Parameters:
        position - Position on screen.
        sprite - Protection sprite representation.
        duration - Protection bonus duration in seconds.
